abstract: General Mills is offering custom editions of DC's Justice League comic books inside "specially-marked boxes" of its Big G line of cereals.
snippet: General Mills is offering custom editions of DC's Justice League comic books inside "specially-marked boxes" of its Big G line of cereals.
lead_paragraph: A marketing mainstay of bygone days, prizes inside boxes of cereal, is alive and well, with brands like the Big G line of cereals from General Mills offering various free trinkets and tchotchkes from time to time.
